docs.snippet: More videographers are using small drones to capture that perfect, death-defying shot – of a wedding....

headline.print_headline: Australian Ogilvy Doing the Barracuda in Style
headline.main: Australian Ogilvy Doing the Barracuda in Style

headline.print_headline: Longtime Braves Broadcaster Van Wieren Dies at 69
headline.main: Longtime Braves Broadcaster Van Wieren Dies at 69

docs.snippet: Pete Van Wieren, the bespectacled broadcaster who was part of the landmark team that carried Atlanta Braves games throughout the nation on Ted Turner's "SuperStation," died Saturday after a battle with cancer, the team said. He was 69....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pete Van Wieren, the bespectacled broadcaster who was part of the landmark team that carried Atlanta Braves games throughout the nation on Ted Turner's "SuperStation," died Saturday after a battle with cancer, the team said. He was 69.

headline.print_headline: Longoria Homers, Rays Rough Up Wilson, Angels 10-3
headline.main: Longoria Homers, Rays Rough Up Wilson, Angels 10-3

docs.snippet: Evan Longoria hit a two-run homer, Ben Zobrist got four hits and the Tampa Bay Rays roughed up C.J. Wilson and the Los Angeles Angels 10-3 Saturday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Evan Longoria hit a two-run homer, Ben Zobrist got four hits and the Tampa Bay Rays roughed up C.J. Wilson and the Los Angeles Angels 10-3 Saturday night.

headline.print_headline: Cano's 3-Run HR Lifts Mariners Over Orioles 6-3
headline.main: Cano's 3-Run HR Lifts Mariners Over Orioles 6-3

docs.snippet: Robinson Cano hit a three-run homer, Dustin Ackley had a solo shot and the Seattle Mariners got an effective outing from their bullpen in a 6-3 victory over the Baltimore Orioles on Saturday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Robinson Cano hit a three-run homer, Dustin Ackley had a solo shot and the Seattle Mariners got an effective outing from their bullpen in a 6-3 victory over the Baltimore Orioles on Saturday night.

headline.print_headline: Keselowski Wins NASCAR Nationwide Race in Iowa
headline.main: Keselowski Wins NASCAR Nationwide Race in Iowa

docs.snippet: Brad Keselowski held off the charging Michael McDowell on Saturday night to win the NASCAR Nationwide race at Iowa Speedway....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski held off the charging Michael McDowell on Saturday night to win the NASCAR Nationwide race at Iowa Speedway.

headline.print_headline: Marlins Beat Reds 2-1 on Yelich's Hit in 10th
headline.main: Marlins Beat Reds 2-1 on Yelich's Hit in 10th

headline.print_headline: Nationals Bats Come Alive in 11-0 Rout of Phillies
headline.main: Nationals Bats Come Alive in 11-0 Rout of Phillies

docs.snippet: Anthony Rendon homered and drove in four runs, Jordan Zimmermann pitched seven shutout innings, and the Washington Nationals routed the Philadelphia Phillies 11-0 Saturday night....
